Package com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationUtil
    This class provides the means to generate DocumentFactory, Document and FieldDescriptor objects from annotated java classes/objects and the opposite.
    ComplexField.NullFunction  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ComplexField
    Created by fonso on 27.03.17.
    Entry  
    Facet
    Use this field for faceting.
    Field
    Field-level configuration on how the field is put into the Search-Index.
    FullText
    Enable full-text search for this field.
    Id
    The unique id of an item in the Search-Index.
    Ignore
    Do not add this field to the Search-Index.
    Metadata  
    Operator
    Created by fonso on 28.03.17.
    Score  
    Type
    the type of the indexed item.
